rule_image_name.description: Name of image used for road network pattern rules.

population_density_image_name.description: Name of image used for population density.

water_map_image_name.description: Name of image used for water

land_use_image_name.description: Name of image used for land use

max_road_network_iterations.description: Maximum iterations allowed for generating road segments.

max_minor_road_iterations.description: Maximum number of iterations for generating minor roads

major_vertex_min_distance.description: Minimum allowed distance between major road vertices.

grid_straight_road_probability.description: Probability [0-1] of a road going straight being generated for the grid pattern.

grid_road_turn_probability.description: Probability [0-1] that a turn will be generated for the grid pattern.

grid_road_min_length.description: Minimum length of a road segment for the grid pattern.

grid_road_max_length.description: Maximum length of a road segment for the grid pattern.

organic_straight_road_probability.description: Probability [0-1] of a road going straight being generated for the organic pattern.

organic_road_turn_probability.description: Probability that a turn will be generated for the organic pattern.

organic_road_min_length.description: Minimum length of a road segment for the organic pattern.

organic_road_max_length.description: Maximum length of a road segment for the organic pattern.

radial_straight_road_probability.description: Probability [0-1] of a road going straight being generated for the radial pattern.

radial_road_turn_probability.description: Probability [0-1] that a turn will be generated for the radial pattern.

radial_road_min_length.description: Minimum length of a road segment for the radial pattern.

radial_road_max_length.description: Maximum length of a road segment for the radial pattern.

grid_legend.description: Color used to represent the grid rule.

organic_legend.description: Color used to represent the organic rule.

radial_legend.description: Color used to represent the radial rule.

minor_road_min_length.description: Minimum length of a minor road seed road.

minor_road_max_length.description: Maximum length of a minor road seed road.

minor_road_seed_probability.description: Probability [0-1] of a minor road seed road being generated.

minor_vertex_min_distance.description: Minimum allowed distance between minor road vertices.

minor_road_organic_probability.description: Probability [0-1] of using the organic rule for minor roads.

residential_legends.description: Grayscale values used to represent residential areas.

commercial_legends.description: Grayscale values used to represent commercial areas.

industry_legends.description: Grayscale values used to represent industry areas.

population_scaling_factor.description: Value used to scale population density to [0-1] range.

pixel_scaling_factor.description: Value used to scale pixels to meters. Derived from input image using QGIS.
